body: Also this is a 100% ntr albeit a weak one. I can go on about that too but I digress. This has all the hallmarks of a typical ntr. Although by definition the girl is being stolen hence implies the MC and girl must be in a relationship but this isn't actually true. Many ntr simply involves a crappy guy taking advantage of a girl who falls for him despite once liking a nicer guy who still likes her back and is unable to do anything. The MC and girl usually has some sort of relationship but not necessarily romantic. That is why cheating and ntr aren't the same. IDK what else to say. It is basic pattern recognition skill at this point. I don't think a story need to fit the precise technical definition or get tagged to be a ntr. You know when you read one. If you ask the author, he will likely call it ntr. This is basic comprehension and critical thinking which apparently a lot of people here lack.

Having a wall of text in which part of it says she is a smart girl with good grades doesn' work if she doesn't act like it. Show not tell. She doesn't act smart and certainly believing in santa doesn't make her appear smart. The author tried to imply she is outwardly innocent and cute but also smart. I get the author tried to make her seem perfect outwardly as a foil to her sexual activities but failed hard. Smart kids also tend to be more mature and the brief scene we see is her being childish. A innocent but intelligent person would be more like Shinomiya Kaguya, not a moeblob.

This is so short I don't feel bad atvall. Didn't get invested. But doesn't matter anyway since they aren't even dating so she can have sex friends all she wants. Besides is it such a loss? You got a dumb slut who still believes in santa and banged the entire class plus some manwhore who slept with 38 females before her and cheated on her with 3 more after. If she think that manwhore is high quality then she is a lost cause.
It's completely normal for some people to have sex friends. It's their life to live and no one should feel obligated to bang another person just because they're childhood friends.
